# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I have decided to extend this offer to you at a price of $750000. This exceptional item not only represents a significant investment but also carries the potential for substantial growth in value over time. I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business, and I am confident it will meet your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or arrange a viewing. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
